author: Zephyrkul (Zephyrkul#1089)
install_msg: Thank you and commiserations for installing FluffyCogs.
name: FluffyCogs
short: Only the fluffiest of cogs go here.
description:
act: Lets you command the bot to perform an action on someone else.
skyrim: Say a random line from Skyrim. WARNING: Spoilers for Skyrim.
theme: Allows you to set themes to easily play accross all servers.
